net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource

Class HostnameSelector<T extends ResourceHostname>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.HostnameSelector<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the hostname type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WeightedHostnameSelector

    @DependsOn
public abstract class HostnameSelector<T extends ResourceHostname>
extends Object
    Selects hostnames for the ResourceURLGenerator. This implementation will automatically populate the hostnames based on the configured hostname type. The hostnames are retrieved from the spring configuration.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
